title: ISic004413. Epitaph for Kallo
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΚΑΛΛΟΥΣ

Apparatus criticus

  • text of Sofia 2018

English translation

(Tomb) of Kallo

commentary

The name Καλλώ is not attested in Sicily, but is reasonably widespread, including western Greece.

bibliography

  • Bacci et al. 2015 160 and fig.82 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002593
  • Sofia 2015 115 fig.118 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001575
  • Sofia 2018 107 no.3 and fig.4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001574
